levels.description: Throws an Alchemical Unit. For <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds, enemies around the landing point suffer from <@ba.vup>{-atk:0%}</> <$ba.weaken>Enfeeble</> and take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage per second
